languages.text: Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}raging woe{/g} on their allies.
languages.original_text: Увеличивает показатель {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} противников на 1, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} на 1 в соответствии с уровнем эффекта Ярость скорбящего у убитого союзного существа.

traits.locale_text: Increases enemies' Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill by +1 as well as damage by +1 for every level of raging woe on their allies.

Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of raging woe on their allies.

Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of raging woe on their allies.

languages.text: Увеличивает показатель {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} противников на 1, а {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} на 1 в соответствии с уровнем эффекта Ярость скорбящего у убитого союзного существа.

traits.locale_text: Увеличивает показатель ББ и ДБ противников на 1, а урон на 1 в соответствии с уровнем эффекта Ярость скорбящего у убитого союзного существа.

languages.text: Erhöht für jede Stufe von {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}"Wütender Kummer"{/g} die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} von Feinden um +1, außerdem ihren {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um +1.
languages.original_text: Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}raging woe{/g} on their allies.

traits.locale_text: Erhöht für jede Stufe von Wütender Kummer die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} von Feinden um +1, außerdem ihren Schaden um +1.

languages.text: Confère aux ennemis un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de +1 ainsi que +1 point de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaire par niveau de {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}Terrible malheur{/g} appliqué à leurs alliés.
languages.original_text: Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}raging woe{/g} on their allies.

traits.locale_text: Confère aux ennemis un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} de +1 ainsi que +1 point de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaire par niveau de Terrible malheur appliqué à leurs alliés.

languages.text: 此生物的盟友每有1层{g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}r“悲苦难言”{/g}效果，攻击他们的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高1点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}也会提高1点。
languages.original_text: Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}raging woe{/g} on their allies.

traits.locale_text: 此生物的盟友每有1层“悲苦难言”效果，攻击他们的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}就会提高1点，造成的伤害也会提高1点。

languages.text: Aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} en +1 y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en +1 por cada nivel de {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}Dolor furibundo{/g} en sus aliados.
languages.original_text: Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}raging woe{/g} on their allies.

traits.locale_text: Aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} en +1 y el daño en +1 por cada nivel de Dolor furibundo en sus aliados.

languages.text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が +1上昇し、 味方の怒り狂う災いのレベルごとに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を +1与える。
languages.original_text: Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of raging woe on their allies.

traits.locale_text: 敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が +1上昇し、 味方の怒り狂う災いのレベルごとにダメージを +1与える。

languages.text: Dost birimler üzerindeki her {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}yas tutanın öfkesi{/g} seviyesi için düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} nitelikleri ile {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarlarını{/g} +1 artırır.
languages.original_text: Increases enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by +1 as well as {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +1 for every level of {g|f:b31aa356d74f4df59c69cbca494183b3}raging woe{/g} on their allies.
